title: WTB: Old Judge / Allen Ginter / Mayo Cut Plug / Goodwin of some big guys in low grade
author: mouschi

posts.post_title: WTB: Old Judge / Allen Ginter / Mayo Cut Plug / Goodwin of some big guys in low grade
posts.post_content: Looking for some bigger names like Anson, Kelly, Keefe, etc. in lower grades that present really well.  Ideally, I'd like to get one of each kind just to have an example of each types of these in my collection.
